function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Interactive web apps providing access to COVID-19 data without coding.","Impact":"Potential for misuse or misinterpretation of data leading to false conclusions.","Mitigation":"Ensure clear and thorough documentation on data sources, limitations, and appropriate use.","Technologies":"Web app security measures, data validation and verification tools.","People":"General public, researchers, policymakers.","Owner":"Developers, data scientists, public health officials."},{"Description":"Forecast model predicting high death toll.","Impact":"Misleading predictions causing panic or complacency in response.","Mitigation":"Use multiple forecast models and provide uncertainty ranges, communicate limitations of the model.","Technologies":"Advanced forecasting algorithms, statistical validation techniques.","People":"Public, policymakers, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Data scientists, public health officials."},{"Description":"Decreasing linear daily percent changes in confirmed cases and deaths in China.","Impact":"Risk of overconfidence in the effectiveness of containment measures.","Mitigation":"Continuously monitor and analyze data, consider potential outliers and anomalies.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, anomaly detection algorithms.","People":"Public, policymakers, public health officials.","Owner":"Data analysts, public health officials."}]}
